official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to establish a criminal penalty for defrauding individuals in connection with enrollment under a prescription drug plan or under the Medicare Advantage Program.
short_title: Medicare Plan Enrollment Fraud Protection Act of 2005

summary.text: Medicare Plan Enrollment Fraud Protection Act of 2005 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to establish a criminal penalty for fraud in connection with enrollment under an Medicare Advantage plan or prescription drug plan.

titles.title: Medicare Plan Enrollment Fraud Protection Act of 2005

To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to establish a criminal penalty for defrauding individuals in connection with enrollment under a prescription drug plan or under the Medicare Advantage Program.
